overview: Simone, an eleven years old, lives in the countryside with his irascible father, who constantly punishes him forbidding him to leave. However, the boy's thirst for adventure is such that just leaking. Then undertakes the search for a mythical being, Man Match, which can fulfill your deepest desires.

production_companies.name: Cineforum Teramo Lumiere Gianni di Venanzo

title: The Thin Match Man
